title: amudam uNNuvOm
sahitya:
amudam uNNuvOm shrI hari bhajanaiyil Urip-perugum


anupallavi

  tama guNam pOga manadai vilakki sAtvIkamAm pashuvin pAlum
amaidi teLinda arivut-tEnum anbil viLainda aruLum kUTTi


caraNam    ahambhAvat-turumbai aghaTri aDikkarumbin sArai Utri
sukham tarum kanirasamum kUTTi shuddha nAma sankIrtanamAm
